properties.description: A place to enjoy a hot drink, breakfast rolls and later soup and toasties. We have newspapers, games and activities. Donations welcome
properties.title: Greenock Salvation Army Community Cafe

properties.address: New Parish Church Port Glasgow, Port Glasgow, Inverclyde PA14 5JD
properties.description: This is a social enterprise project which offers hot food and a warm, safe environment to all members of the community. It is a pay what you can and offers home made soup, toasties, cake and tea for a minimal cost
properties.title: New Parish Church Port Glasgow Chatty Cafe
